column2: Liquid Media Group Ltd. is a media and entertainment company, which engages in content IP spanning creative industries. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia and currently employs 95 full-time employees. The firm is vertically integrated global studio producing content for all platforms including film, Television, gaming and Virtual Reality through its network of shared services. The company is a multi-platform, multi-faceted entertainment and an intellectual property aggregator, dedicated to bringing content to the world.
